column1: aimeemarie 156177059869 "2017-01-21 18:40:28 GMT" https://aimeemarie.tumblr.com/post/156177059869/bee-magick-save-the-bees "moonlightacademy: This post is dedicated to the bees
column2: make sure you do your part to save the bees!Â Facts to increase your love for bees:They have personalities.They can recognize human faces.Their honey contains all the substances needed to sustain life.Eating Honey can make you smarter.Honeybees can only sting once.They beat their wings up to 200 times per second.Honeybees are the only insects that produce food for humans.Bees donâ€™t sleep.All worker bees are female.Ways to attract bees:Plant flowers that attract bees.Build a bee houses.Place bee waterers and bee baths around your garden.Do not use pesticides or herbicides of any kind.Plants that attract bees:Bee balmLavenderCrocusSnow DropWildflowers/Any native speciesCatmintBorageAnise hyssopHeliotropeSunflowerOreganoYarrowConeflowerBlack eyed susanAstersGoldenrodFoxgloveMarigoldPansiesSweet peasNasturtiumsBee folklore:It is unlucky to kill bees.Believed to have the knowledge of the future and all secrets.Â If a bee lands on your hand
column3: it suggests money is on itâ€™s way.If a bee lands on someones head
column4: they will become successful in life.Â If a bee flies into a home
column5: it means either good luck or a stranger is on their way. If you kill the bee it means the stranger will be bringing bad news.Seeing a single bee will bring luck.  Bees buzzing around a childâ€™s head foretells a happy
column6: successful life.  Bee mythology:Ancient Egyptian pharaohs used the bee as their royalty symbol. They believed honey bees were born from the tears of the sun God
column8: bees represented resurrection and protected against evil spirits.Â Druids believed that bees represented the sun
column11: and community.The Greeks thought that a babies whose lips where touched by a bee would become a great poet or a great speaker. In ancient Greece it was also thought that they symbolized industry
column14: and obedience. Honey was often used as an offering to their Gods. They also believed bees were the surviving souls of the priestesses who served the Goddess Aphrodite.Â They have been seen as a symbol of sacredness and could be associated with the Great Mother or Divine feminine. The Mother can be symbolized as the queen bee.Â In Celtic mythology honey bees had great wisdom and thought to be messengers between worlds. Honey was sacred and used in rituals.In some cultures they can be associated with purity
column16: and wealth. Some also believed bees were a symbol of the human soul.The druids believed that bees symbolized the sun
column19: and community.Deities associated with bees and honey:AphroditeRaVishnuPanVishnuCybeleMellonaMelissa (Melisae)NeithApolloArtemisFreyaThorDemeterBees in Magick:Bees are closely associated with the fae and their presence in gardens which indicates blessings of fae. Encourage the bees
column22: planting bee-friendly plants and waterers and not using pesticides. Thus
column23: encouraging the blessings from the fae
column24: while harming bees can anger them and cause them to seek revenge.Â The symbol of a bee can be used to seal a spell with sweetness for one who appreciates good will and a sting for one who takes it for granted or doesnâ€™t keep his end of the bargain.Â Honey stirred into your tea canÂ â€˜sweetenâ€™ your day.Â Honey is used often in magick to sweeten a situation.Anointing your lips with honey will make your words sound sweeter.Â Bees in your dreams:May be a good omen.Bees in your dreams may be telling you to take a look at your social networks. They may be pointing toward a desire for more harmonious and functional relationships
column25: or celebrating the ones you already have.A visit from a bee in a dream may also be notifying you that a friend or family member needs to speak with you. You will know as this person will also pop into your mind somehow. It means call them or perhaps
column26: that you will hear from them soon.Dreaming of a beehive usually relates to the home and family or your business and coworkers. A happy
column28: buzzing home. It may foretell incoming abundance
column29: and fruitful times ahead. If the bees are swarming around the hive
column31: proceed with caution. There is a lack of harmony that is interfering with productivity.A swarm of bees may indicate that you feel that a group of people upon whose cooperation you rely is becoming chaotic and out of control. Perhaps the need to balance your own interactions with your different business and social groups for your own sanity.Beehives bring to mind abundance and prosperity: bees seem to work hard and are rewarded by flowing stores of honey. An empty beehive
column33: represents the opposite: lost opportunity and financial misfortune.A beehive can also represent a home. The fullness or emptiness of the beehive may indicate unconscious feelings about family life
column36: or the house itself. Honey may represent your property or belongings.A beehive on fire or burned bees are often interpreted depending on your emotional and physical condition. Burned bees may mean you are overcoming fear and want to take control of life and anger
column37: are youâ€™re progressing through life with more confidence without any fear of obstacles. Burned beehives can also mean you have lost something precious
column40: or some valuable information that youâ€™ve forgotten or ignored.If a bee or a swarm of bees is chasing you in dream
column41: it may mean there is some unsettled business or a memory that haunts you. Make sure you let it go from your mind or deal with it in order to avoid these bees.If you dream about getting a bee sting then something may be bothering you
column42: or you have a persistent annoyance in your life. Concerns about your relationship
column45: or some unknown issue is bugging your subconscious mind. Find out what it is and sort it out.Magickal uses for Honey:Can be used in binding spells to symbolically stick things together.Used for offerings to fae and deities.Can sweeten a person or a situation.Â Honey is sacred to Aphrodite.Can be used in spells corresponding to purification
column53: Â Use certain types of honey that corresponded with your spell.Bathe in warm water and honey to attract love.A dish filled with honey can attract angels and beneficial spirits.Do your part to save the bees they are an important part of our life and in our magick practices.Â May the moon light your path!==Moonlight Academy==Sources: witchipedia.com

column1: aimeemarie 156131854134 "2017-01-20 18:33:16 GMT" https://aimeemarie.tumblr.com/post/156131854134/dearmyblank-to-everyone-do-me-a-favor-go-to "dearmyblank: To Everyone; Do me a favor: go to Google and look up what the Milky Way galaxy looks like. Try to find our solar system. Canâ€™t
column2: can you? Weâ€™re just a spec. Now
column3: do me one more favor: type â€œgalaxiesâ€ in the google search instead
column4: then click â€œimages.â€ You should be looking at satellite telescope images of thousands of galaxies. Pretty neat
column5: right?  When you sit and think about that
column6: and you think of how vast space truly is and how weâ€™re microscopic in comparisonâ€¦ itâ€™s mind boggling how minuscule so many of our stresses really are. That person doesnâ€™t like you? The stranger on the bus was an ass? You get a bad grade on something? Your boss is a dick? Your parents no longer your parents? Guess what? An ant colony functions generally on one system per ant society. Theyâ€™re born
column8: they die. They build a colony
column12: die. Thatâ€™s it. Thatâ€™s all.  Now
column13: imagine if this planet was one colony out of millions. What does the problems of one ant actually matter to the greater flow of nature? I know
column14: that sounds harsher than I intended and I didnâ€™t mean it like that. What Iâ€™m saying isâ€¦ Time is possibly the most destructive thing of all (or possibly the greatest blessing of all; perspective
column16: and with the passing of time
column17: all these problems will melt away and mean nothing. Your broken heart will mend. Your grade will improve (or not
column18: but should that dictate the rest of your life?)
column20: youâ€™ll meet people that will care. All the while
column24: the universe will still expandâ€¦ time will still pass. 60-80 years is only nano seconds in comparison to the universe itself.  Since life is so short
column25: why waste it on negativity? Look to the stars and see with wondering eyes the beauty that exists beyond the stratosphere. Beyond the solar system. Beyond the Milky Way. What wonders exist that we know nothing of? Look up rather than down. Hold your head high.  An ant concerns itself not of the opinions of other ants. It cares not about the resource another ant found or why it brings it to the colony. It concerns itself only with what it thinks is useful and offers the fruits of its labor to the big picture. Just because it grabbed part of a leaf doesnâ€™t mean it is going to fight another ant over its choice to grab a grain or a twig or even a piece of trash. Concern yourself not about the opinions of others or the lives of others. Do you and just live.  Itâ€™s a hard lesson for me. Iâ€™m down almost every day. Iâ€™m distraught all the damn time and I search this blog endlessly for a letter for me. No one is thinking of me right now. Thatâ€™s fine though. Iâ€™m a single mama just trying to make the best of the life Iâ€™m given before Iâ€™m food for the worms. There are so many wonderful things out there to see
column27: and experience.  Hold your head up and open your eyes. You canâ€™t see the sunshine with your eyes shut. Stop worrying about the petty shit. Itâ€™ll pass. Your love will come for you (even if it isnâ€™t who you expected; usually
column28: it is someone better than you hoped for which means right now just isnâ€™t your time). Your boss will eventually fuck off
column32: youâ€™ll get that career.  Be positive. Things will happen in their own time. Until then
column33: see the sun. Hear the laughs. Taste the wine. Smell the roses. Feel the beauty. Donâ€™t ever forget to take in each and every beautiful moment before itâ€™s gone for good. All in good time
column34: my loves. All in good time.  Live. Love. Learn. ğŸ’‹ Eternally
column35: A Patiently Waiting Single Mama  aka G." False text

column1: aimeemarie 151308694929 "2016-10-03 22:47:43 GMT" https://aimeemarie.tumblr.com/post/151308694929/awakening-transformed "iceandgravity: i. I wake to thunder and the patter of rain on the sill. The bricks of the buildings through my window shine wet. I think of you. Sleep is still sliding from my bones when my phone pulses; I see your face.  I hear your voice
column2: wishing for me
column3: wishing me good morning. The universe is a sweet nectar that flows thick from your mouth to mine.  I tell you how good your voice tastes at the break of day. I breathe. ii. Put the phone down
column4: now. Light candles to adorn the grey day. Make coffee to warm your hands because he is far
column5: and they get so cold sometimes. Sit on your bed. Write
column6: breathe. Bathe in the potential of this newborn day
column7: feel the glittering nascent moments at the edge of being. Think of this old house. Think of the people who live here. Think of how you love them. Think of how they saved you. Remember the shards of Family you had to pick out of your heart like shrapnel.  Remember how they helped tear the heartbreak from your flesh and loved you til you were new again. Let yourself cry a little because you love them. They are the stunning mosaic you built from what was broken. They rewrote the word â€˜familyâ€™ again and again for you
column8: until it was full of the love and grace that makes it shine now. Think of the man youâ€™ve fallen in love with.  Think of how suddenly you have relaxed into something so deep as this.  Think of how the word â€˜doubtâ€™ has no more meaning in the place behind his eyes. Smell the soft candles. Feel the cool sheets. Look out your bedroom window at the church across the wayâ€“ Center for Divine Love. You are here. You are home. Heartbeat under flesh. You are here. You are home." False text

column2: but in honor of pride month
column3: here are some important events in the queer community that took place in June:6/28/1969 The infamous Stonewall Riots take place. Patrons at the Mafia-run gay bar riot when police attempt a raid. This event ignited a spark in the community and is often said to be the start of a movement.Â 6/28/1970 The one-year anniversary of the Stonewall Riots is a cause for celebration. Christopher St. Liberation Day is the day of the first ever gay pride parade. Thousands of members of the LGBTQ+ community march through New York City.Â 6/1988 After activists bring the AIDS epidemic to D.C
column4: the CDC sends flyers to every home for awareness.6/26/2003 The Supreme Court rules that sodomy laws are unconstitutional in the Lawrence v. Texas case.6/17/2009 President Obama signs a memorandum that gives health benefits to federal employees in same-sex partnerships.6/24/2011 New York signs the Marriage Equality Act.6/26/2013 The Supreme Court rules that section 3 of DOMA (Defense of Marriage Act) is unconstitutional.6/9/2015 The Military Equal Opportunity Policy is adjusted to include gay and lesbian members.6/23/2015 The Stonewall Inn is officially designated a New York City landmark.6/26/2015 The Supreme Court rules same-sex marriage bans unconstitutional.June is such an important month in the history of our community. And please

I donâ€™t care how â€œmatureâ€ your teenage partner is. I donâ€™t care howÂ â€œcarefulâ€ you are to â€œnot be abusiveâ€. I donâ€™t care how much you want this relationship. I donâ€™t care how much that kid wants to date you. If you are in your 20s (or older!) and your partner is both a teenager and more than a year or two younger
column2: that relationship is actively dangerous to your partner. It is your responsibility as an adult to not date a child. Kids should be able to have harmless crushes on adults without adults acting on them.  Kids should be exploring their sexuality and romantic feelings with other kids their own age
column3: not with adults. It is not possible to have an adult/child dating relationship without an unhealthy power dynamic. Being in a romantic or sexual relationship with an child is emotional and/or sexual abuse.  Teenagers need to learn where healthy boundaries lie between them and authority figures/people with power over them. Encouraging them to date adults actively discourages teenagers from developing appropriate boundaries.Â   However â€œkindâ€ you are to your teenage partner
column5: and that is 100% YOUR FAULT. It is your responsibility as an adult to not date a child. " False text

column1: aimeemarie 81179773316 "2014-03-30 13:57:25 GMT" https://aimeemarie.tumblr.com/post/81179773316/dr-nancy-snubs-out-e-cigarette-myths-nbc-news "sd-liberty:   Do e-cigarettes really help smokers quit? Dr. Nancy Snyderman debunks myths surrounding the cigarette substitute. - NBC News  Holy Bullshit
column2: Batman! Okay
column3: technically nothing she says here is false. But it is deliberately misleading. â€œLet me throw some scary science words at you and then ANTIFREEZE! Everyone knows that shitâ€™s poison!â€ The first scary science word she uses is â€œDiethylene Glycolâ€ Diethylene Glycol is an organic compound that is a biproduct of Ethylene Glycol
column4: which is another organic compound which is used in antifreeze for its heat disrupting properties. Diethylene Glycol is only found in antifreeze because you canâ€™t completely separate it from the primary ingredient (Ethylene Glycol). Laboratory testing with mammals suggests that it is between 2 and 25Â g/kg less toxic than Ethylene Glycol
column5: which has a minimum reported lethal dose of 786Â mg/kg for humans. Some quick math leads me to believe that a person
column7: would have to ingest .71kg (or roughly 1.5lb) of the stuff at one time to kill them. Medical treatment only becomes necessary if a person ingests more than .1mL per kg (body weight). That means it would take over 16 milliliters (a tablespoon and change) at once to make our 90kg person need the minimum amount of medical attention. And Diethylene Glycol is less toxic than this stuff. Oh
